lead_paragraph: South Korean organizers have officially selected former government minister Lee Hee-beom as the new head of the 2018 Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang.

headline.print_headline: Ex Minister Nominated to Head 2018 Pyeongchang Winter Games
headline.main: Ex Minister Nominated to Head 2018 Pyeongchang Winter Games
